Charlotte Mountain

I am a southern california native, currently residing with my fiancé and our cats in Nashville. I enjoy problem-solving and learning, whether it relates to programming or human behavior. I'm a naturally curious, adaptable person who is eager to tackle any challenge that comes my way.

After working in the Customer Service industry for over 8 years. I decided to Leading me to earn a Certificate in Full Stack Development from the University of California San Diego Extension, with developed skills in JavaScript, CSS, Node.js, JQuery, MySQL and responsive web design.

Since then I have further advanced my skills by becoming dominate in PHP and WordPress.

Web Developer leveraging a background in customer service to build a more intuitive user experience on the web. With each project, my aim is to best engage my audience for an impactful user experience. Excited to leverage my skills in the future as part of a fast-paced, quality-driven team!

Just trying to be the best cat mom I can be.
); } }
